alert.note: Alert for Green; Iowa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 2:11PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Green, southeastern Iowa and southern Dane Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 211 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mount Horeb to 9 miles east of Dodgeville to 6 miles east of Mineral Point. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Fitchburg, Verona, Oregon, McFarland, Monona, Mount Horeb, Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Cottage Grove, Belleville, New Glarus, Shorewood Hills, Brooklyn, Blanchardville, Barneveld, Blue Mounds, Dayton, Ridgeway and Waldwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
